subject: World Series
Baseball
lead_paragraph: John McNamara managed the 1986 Boston Red Sox, the only team before this season’s Rangers to come within one out — one strike, in fact — of winning the World Series, only to lose it.
snippet: John McNamara managed the 1986 Boston Red Sox, the only team before this season’s Rangers to come within one out — one strike, in fact — of winning the World Series, only to lose it.
